title: Artificial neural network-based QSAR model for predicting degradation techniques of pharmaceutical contaminants in water bodies with experimental verification
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00137K, Paper
Jhon Alex González-Amaya, Andrea Nadith Niño-Colmenares, Andrés Felipe Cárdenas-Rodríguez, James Guevara-Pulido
The pharmaceutical industry has been increasing its production, manufacturing, and promotion of various products, resulting in a rise in contaminants in water.
